name: DONG HO - Journey to the root
name_original: DONG HO - Journey to the root
description:
A game inspired by traditional Vietnamese folk paintings
Vietnamese folk paintings are a form of traditional arts and craft, intangible cultural heritage which are on the verge of extinction and need to be restored and preserved.
As an adventure game which creates a mission for players to search for 7 different creatures and  put them back to their original paintings,  Dong Ho- Journey to the root would like to assess and identify, raise awareness to renew interest and bring new light in such heritages.
